item.title: How to install an older OTA release in your Ubuntu Phone
item.description: We saw how to change the channel of our Ubuntu Phone from stable to RC proposed, or whatever you want. But, how could we downgrade the phone to a previous OTA? Setting the revision we want in the ubuntu-device-flash command :) You need to know which revision is for what OTA and which device you have: 1. Know your device codename (Connect phone by USB and enable Developer Mode in Settings):
